divs: Sighting Detailsi was 9 or 10 and my sister was 13 or 14 years old we where at are babysiters house in sugarcreek ohio way down wimington pike,which is where i beleive to be a hotspot,but i will explaine that later. all i can remember is my sister saying to are babysitter,whats that,i remember the dog was going crazy and we all stared at three discs moving in formation moving very slow i would say they wher about 120 feet in the air,i remember every one getting scared and a uncomfortable weied scary but exciting feeling,our babysitter ran outside about halfway to there barn freeking out staring up at these things.they wher coming closer and closer to there barn when the big one that was leading the two smaller ones stopped moving and hovverd right obove the barn,then i spaceficly remember a bright red lazer beam of light came out from under big one,it was the whole circumfrence of the bottom,it was a huge thick beam,i remember someone yelling to our babysitter to get in the house,it was either her husban or one of her two kids,charles or jesica,thats realy all i remember.i recently about two years ago asked my sister what she rememberd,and all she had to say was she rememberd the red beam,she dosnt talk about,never did,its like she doesnt want to or maybee doesnt care im not sure,all i know is i am very interested about ufo's since then and want to know more. mufon, if u read this i would like talk to someone about some my other expierence in the same area about two years ago,also i think it would be very interesting if you guys talked to the shumway family about the ufo's,and what they remember.my other expierence is crazy and would take me forever to type,sorry, and thank you feel free to call me at937 307 3846 take care and godbess
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sugarcreek
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: there where three of them in formation the one leading was much larger
